#summary Release Note for LiveAndroid v0.3 - 20090821
#labels liveandroid,v0.3,release

= Introduction =

LiveAndroid v0.3 is here


= Features =

  * OpenDNS added
  * Audio support
    * virtualbox - Intel 8x0 AC97
    * VMware - Ensoniq AudioPCI 1371/1373)
  * SD card support (512M)
  * Ethernet (DHCP)
  * Mouse wheel support
  * High-resolution support (800*600, 1024*768)
  * Apps added (PilotLines, Software Directory, Craigs Races, AndroidVNC, Super Mario)
  * more net card driver added (Amd PCNET32 PCI, Broadcom 440x/47xx, CS89x0, Intel PRO/100+, NE2000/NE1000, Realtek RTL-8129/8130/8139)


= Tested platforms =

  * Virtual Machine
  * tell us :)


= Download =

  * LiveCD iso: liveandroidv0.3.iso
